articles.title: Lunar Eclipse 2022: Date, Time And How To Watch Last "Blood Moon" This Year In India - NDTV
articles.description: Parts of India and the globe will witness another celestial event on Tuesday as a "Blood Moon" will be visible for approximately 85 minutes from North America, parts of South America, Asia, Australia and New Zealand.
articles.content:
Moon will pass into Earth's shadow and turn red on November 8. (File)
